tooltip.item.blood_vial: Special blood used in ministration, Restores HP.
tooltip.item.blood_stone_shard: A solid shard that forms in coldblood.
tooltip.item.coldblood: A thick droplet of coldblood containing Blood Echoes.
tooltip.item.great_ones_wisdom: Fragments of the lost wisdom of the Great Ones, beings that might be described as gods.
tooltip.item.mad_mans_knowledge: Skull of a madman touched by the wisdom of the Great Ones.
